transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Namaskar sir.
Customer: Rajeet baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Rajeet ji.
Customer: Ha sir, bol rahe hai na jo pay with IndiaMART ka option to yaha nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Pay with IndiaMART ka option.
Customer: Mane pay with IndiaMART agar koi payment karega to usko to number ko link bhejna padta hai to kaha se bhejenge?
Executive: Sir wo band ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: Band ho gaya?
Executive: Ha, ye kab tak band ho gaya?
Executive: Bata deta hu kab band ho gaya, line pe rahiye sir.
Customer: Sir use kitna saal ho gaya band hue?
Customer: Ha bataiye.
Customer: Kitna saal ho gaya?
Executive: Do saal ho gaye use band hue.
Customer: Do saal ho gaya? Maine hum log har aadmi ko bolta hai bhai IndiaMART se direct payment hota hai.
Executive: Ha wo lekin band ho gaya hai na sir.
Customer: Ab IndiaMART aapke payment mein agar man lijiye koi credit card mein payment karega wo kaise karenge? Usko to link bhejne jo credit card mein payment kar deta tha. Ab ye kaise kare?
Executive: To aap apna account number wagaira de dijiye na agar aap kisi ko aapko koi payment karna hai.
Customer: Credit card mein thodi account hota hai. Credit card mein thodi account number hota hai. Credit card mein link bhejna padta hai usse payment karta hai.
Executive: Sir aawaz nahi aa rahi aapki case mein.
Customer: Credit card mein credit card payment karne ke liye link bhejna padta hai.
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Aap kiska payment kar rahe hai aap mujhe batayenge?
Customer: Agar koi party payment karega direct IndiaMART through payment karega credit card mein.
Executive: Credit card mein IndiaMART ke through payment karega?
Customer: Ha credit card dekar koi payment karega. Agar man lijiye koi purchase kar raha hai credit card mein payment karega to usko IndiaMART through hi payment karna padta hai na?
Executive: Nahi hai aisa kuch nahi hai directly bhi aap payment manga sakte hai na sir.
Customer: Kaise manga sakte hai?
Executive: Aapko koi paise bhej raha hai aapke kehne ka matlab yahi hai na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha agar aap aapko koi paise bhej raha hai aur to unse boliye aap apna account number de dijiye wo directly aapko bhej denge sir usme koi issue thodi hai sir. Link wagaira ki jarurat nahi hoti hai.
Customer: Nahi ye bol rahe hai ki IndiaMART through hi payment karega. Kabhi sir aadmi ko bharosa nahi hota kisi pe.
Executive: IndiaMART ki sir aap quotation unko bhej dijiye na sir. Quotation bana ke bhej dijiye IndiaMART ke through. Mera baat suniye pehle pay with IndiaMART tha uske second option kuch aaya kya?
Executive: Ek second line par rahega mai aapko bata deta hu. To second option kya pay with IndiaMART jo tha uske second option kuch hai ki dekhiye. Dekh kar mere ko bata dijiye.
Customer: Usko jab aap log remove kar diya second option rakhna pad raha hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha boliye, boliye boliye.
Executive: To unki ek baar humse baat kara dijiye mai hum aap unko bata denge sir usme koi issue thodi hai sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says pay with IndiaMART option unavailable.

- Wants to know alternative to pay via credit card.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that pay with IndiaMART is discontinued.

- Suggested customer share account details for direct transfer.

- Suggested sending quotation through IndiaMART.

- Executive offered to speak with the customer's client.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, credit card, indiamart, quotation
